alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued November 26 at 9:08PM EST until November 29 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM MONDAY TO 7 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 15 inches, with the heaviest snow expected Monday night into Tuesday. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph may result in patchy blowing snow. * WHERE...Lake, Ashtabula Inland and Ashtabula Lakeshore counties. * WHEN...From 7 AM Monday to 7 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Periods of light to moderate lake effect snow may lead to some travel impacts beginning Monday morning. The heaviest snow and most significant impacts are expected Monday night through Tuesday, when snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour will occur within the heaviest snow bands.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
